MINING_HOW_STOP: To stop mining click on 'End mining' or close the terminal
TRANSFER_SELECT_INPUT_MULTI_RECIPENT: Selected input address not available for multi-recipient transactions
TRANSFER_ASSET_FEE_START: The asset transfer requires at least
TRANSFER_ASSET_FEE_END: ETP for miners, so please make sure there is enough ETP in the account.
TRANSFER_NO_MULTISIG_ADDR: No multi-signature address available. Please create one first.
TRANSFER_MULTISIGNATURE_SUCCESS: Multi-signature transaction successfully created. Please send the text below to the next co-signer.
TRANSFER_MULTISIGNATURE_I_HAVE_COPIED: I have copied the information to send to the next co-signer
TRANSFER_SIGN_IS_LAST_TRANSACTION: This is the last signature, broadcast on the Blockchain
TRANSFER_SIGN_SUCCESS: The transaction has been signed successfully. Please send the text below to the next co-signer.
TRANSFER_SIGN_LAST_TX_SUCCESS: The transaction has been signed and broadcast to the blockchain successfully.
CREATE_MULTISIGNATURE_NBR_COSIGNER_REQUI: Number of co-signers required per transaction
ASSET_CREATE_SUCCESS_TEXT1: The asset has been created locally but has not yet been registered into the blockchain.
ASSET_CREATE_SUCCESS_TEXT3: Do you want to Issue this asset?
SETTINGS.MNEMONIC_LOAD_ERROR: Could not load backup words. Please check your input.
SETTINGS.MNEMONIC_LAST_WORD: Last word of your backup words
SETTINGS.EXPORT_ACCOUNT_PATH: Export account to the following path
MESSAGES.PASSWORD_NEEDED_FOR_PRIVATE_KEY: To get your backup words, first enter your account password.
LOGIN.TITLE: Sign in
LOGIN.DESCRIPTION: The Metaverse mainnet wallet (MVSD) is a full-node wallet for cryptocurrency management. Although users interact with the wallet through their browser, MVSD is not a web wallet; users are accessing a locally-stored backend program. With MVSD, you may truly own your private keys and digital assets.
REGISTER.IMPORT_ADDRESS_COUNT: How many addresses do you need to generate? These addresses are the same as your old account's, so if you don't remember how many addresses you used before, it is recommended that you use a bigger number, eg: 100.
REGISTER.IMPORT_LAST_WORD: Last word of your backup words
REGISTER.PRIVATE_KEY_MNEMONIC_WARNING1: 1. It is important to save your backup words. Once they are lost or forgotten, none of your assets can be recovered, including ETP. Please store your backup words in a secure location, such as copying them on paper or storing them on an encrypted flash drive.
REGISTER.PRIVATE_KEY_MNEMONIC_WARNING2: 2. Please memorize the last word of the 24-backup words generated when you create an account, as this will be used to verify that you are the person operating your wallet.
REGISTER.PLEASE_CONFIRM_KEY: Please enter your backup words for confirmation:
REGISTER.CONFIRM_KEY_WORDS_INCORRECT: Incorrect backup words. Please double check all 24 words.
REGISTER.CONFIRM_KEY_WORDS_TOO_MANY: Your backup words contains too many words!
DEPOSIT.HEADLINE: Deposit
HISTORY_ALL_LOADED: All your transactions have been loaded
EXPLORER_ADDRESS_TX_ALL_LOADED: All the transactions have been loaded
EXPLORER_ADDRESS_NO_TX: There are no transactions for this address.
EXPLORER_TRANSACTION_NO_TX: There is no transaction for this hash.
EXPLORER.HEADLINE: Transaction explorer
EXPLORER.TRANSACTION_INPUTS_MINING: Coming from deposit interest or mining
EXPLORER_BLOCK_NO_TX: This block number hasn't been created yet.
EXPLORER_NO_RESULT_OTHER_RESEARCH: Would like you to do another search?
MESSAGES.NO_ACCOUNTNAME_PROVIDED: Please choose a name for your account.
MESSAGES.NO_PASSWORD_PROVIDED: Please choose a password to secure your account.
MESSAGES.PASSWORD_SHORT: Passwords must be at least 6 characters long.
MESSAGES.USERNAME_CONTAINS_SPACE: Please do not put any spaces in your username.
MESSAGES.PASSWORD_CONTAINS_SPACE: Please do not put any spaces in your password.
MESSAGE.WRONG_PRIVATE_KEY: Incorrect backup words. Your backup words contain special characters.
MESSAGES.NO_ADDRESS_NBR: Please enter how many addresses you want to generate.
MESSAGES.GENERAL_CONNECTION_ERROR: Server connection error. Please check server status.
MESSAGES.FUNCTION_NOT_IMPLEMENTED: This function has not been implemented yet, sorry.
MESSAGES.TRANSACTION_VALUE_NEEDED: You need to enter the amount of the transaction.
MESSAGES.TRANSACTION_AMOUNT_NOT_ENOUGH: You do not have enough ETP on this address.
MESSAGES.TRANSFER_SUCCESS: Transfer successful. Your transaction hash is:
MESSAGES.ASSET_CREATED_LOCAL_SUCCESS: Asset created locally. To write it into the blockchain, you need to issue it.
MESSAGES.ASSETS_DELETE_ERROR: The asset could not be deleted
MESSAGES.ASSETS_ISSUE_SUCCESS: The asset will be issued within the next blocks, please wait. Your transaction hash is:
MESSAGES.ASSETS_ISSUE_ERROR: The asset could not be issued
MESSAGES.ASSETS_SECOND_ISSUE_SUCCESS: The maximum supply will be updated within the next blocks. Please wait.
MESSAGES.ASSETS_SECOND_ISSUE_ERROR: The maximum supply could not be increased.
MESSAGES.DEPOSIT_SUCCESS: Deposit successful. The transaction hash is:
MESSAGES.INVALID_VALUE: The amount you entered is not valid.
MESSAGES.INVALID_TIME_PERIOD: The time period is not valid.
MESSAGES.CONTAINS_SPACE: Please do not put any spaces in the path.
MESSAGES.ASSETS_CREATE_ERROR: This asset can not be created.
MESSAGES.TOO_LOW_FEE: The mining fee must be at least 0.0001 ETP.
MESSAGES.TRANSACTION_ASSET_MULTISIG: Sorry, the transfer of Assets via Multi-signature is not available yet.
MESSAGES.ASSETS_TRANSFER_SUCCESS: Asset transaction has been transmitted to the network. Transaction
MESSAGES.EXPORT_ACCOUNT_FILE_SUCCESS: The account has been exported in a file.
MESSAGES.TRANSACTION_NOT_FOUND: Could not find a transaction for the given hash.
MESSAGES.BLOCK_NOT_FOUND: Could not find a block for the given number.
MESSAGES.SIGN_AND_BROADCAST_SUCCESS: Transaction successfully signed and broadcast to the Blockchain.
MESSAGES.SIGN_ERROR: The transaction could not be signed.
MESSAGES.TX_PROCESSED: A new transaction has been processed:
MESSAGES.NEW_VERSION_AVAILABLE: A new version of the wallet is available. Please update your wallet from:
MESSAGES.NEW_VERSION_MAJOR_CHANGE: An important update has been released. Please update your wallet from:
MESSAGE.PLEASE_WAIT_SYNCH: Please wait for full synchronisation before using your wallet
CREATE_PROFILE_VALIDATION.TITLE: Issuing an Avatar costs 1 ETP
CREATE_PROFILE_VALIDATION.TEXT: Are you sure you want to create an Avatar?
MESSAGES.DID_CREATED: New Avatar created successfully! Please wait for the next block to see it. Your transaction hash is:
MESSAGES.ALL_DIDS_LOAD_ERROR: Unable to load the list of Avatars on the blockchain
CREATE_PROFILE.CREATE_ID_WRONG_CHARACTER: Incorrect character. Please only use numbers, letters, dots, dashes, underscores or @
TRANSFER.CORRECT_RECIPIENT_BURN: Send to Burn address. Be careful, those tokens will be permanently burned!
TRANSFER.CORRECT_RECIPIENT_BURN_ETP: Send to Burn address. Be careful, those ETP will be permanently burned!
ASSET_CREATE.SECONDARY_ISSUE_CHECKBOX: Allow additional issuance in the future
ASSET_CREATE.SECONDARY_ISSUE_RATE_DETAIL: There is no minimum ownership condition for a Secondary issue. The owner of the Secondary issue certificate can conduct a secondary issue no matter how many tokens he owns
The asset cannot be Secondary issued, the Maximum Supply cannot be changed (default value)
Secondary issue threshold: the asset can be Secondary issued when the owner owns the Secondary issue certificate and at least this percentage of the Maximum supply of the asset
ASSET_CREATE.SECONDARY_ISSUE_AVATAR_GET_: *The selected avatar will automatically receive the Secondary issue certificate if one of the last two options is selected*
SECONDARY_ISSUE.ADDRESS: Address (this address will pay the transaction fee and receive the new assets)
SECONDARY_ISSUE.NOT_ENOUGH_ETP_PAY_FEE: This address doesn't have enough ETP to pay the transaction fee
SECONDARY_ISSUE_VALIDATION.TITLE: Secondary Issue
MESSAGE.PLEASE_WAIT_SYNCH_LONG: Your wallet is still syncing, the values you see might be outdated. Please wait for full synchronisation
MESSAGES.CANT_LOAD_ALL_DIDS: Error while loading the list of Avatars
MESSAGES.CANT_LOAD_MY_DIDS: Error while loading the list of your Avatars
PROFIL.NO_DID: You don't have any Avatars yet. Create one by clicking on Create Avatar
ASSET_CREATE.NO_DID: You need an Avatar to create an Asset
CREATE_ASSET.DESCRIPTION_TOO_LONG: The maximum length for the description is 64 characters
CREATE_ASSET.SYMBOL_TOO_LONG: The maximum length for the symbol is 64 characters
CREATE_ASSET.SYMBOL_WRONG_CHAR: Incorrect character. Please only use numbers, letters and dots
HELP.MEMO: This memo will be displayed publicly on the blockchain. Do not include any personal data!
HELP.NEW_ACCOUNT_NAME: Your account name is only used locally on your own computer to access your tokens. It is never used on the blockchain
HELP.NEW_ACCOUNT_PASSWORD: This password will be used to login and conduct transactions
HELP.IMPORT_FROM_FILE_NAME: You can either use the same username or a different one than the one you used to create the account
HELP.IMPORT_FROM_FILE_PASSWORD: You need to use the same password used to generate this file
HELP.IMPORT_FROM_FILE_FILE: You can import your account with the file generated via this wallet or via myetpwallet.com. By default, the file name is mvs_keystore.json or mvs_keystore_{accountname}.json
HELP.IMPORT_FROM_WORDS_NAME: You can either use the same username or a different one than the one you used to create the account
HELP.IMPORT_FROM_WORDS_PASSWORD: You can either use the same password as previously or create a new one
HELP.IMPORT_FROM_WORDS_WORDS: Your backup words are 24 common English words which you received when you first created your account. Those words are the key to accessing your funds, so keep them secure!
HELP.IMPORT_FROM_WORDS_ADDRESS_NUMBER: This is the number of addresses that will be generated. If you don't know how many addresses you previously had, you can put a high number (i.e. 100). If you use the same account on myetpwallet.com, it's recommended to key this number low (i.e. 10)
TRANSFER.NOT_ENOUGH_ETP: You do not have enough ETP available (don't forget to take into account the transaction fee)
CREATE_ASSET.MAX_SUPPLY_DECIMALS_TOO_HIG: The selected Maximum Supply / Decimals numbers are too high. Please decrease one of the two
MESSAGES.LISTDIDSADDRESSE_LOAD_ERROR: Error occurred while obtaining the address history of this Avatar.
MESSAGES.DID_ADDRESS_UPDATED: Avatar address updated! Please wait for the next block to see the new address. Your transaction hash is:
PROFIL_MODIFY_ADDRESS.ADDRESS_ALREADY_US: This address is already linked to an Avatar
PROFIL_MODIFY_ADDRESS.ADDRESS_NOT_ENOUGH: You need at least 0.0001 ETP to pay the transaction fee with the new address
MESSAGES.ERROR_DID_MODIFY_ADDRESS: The Avatar address hasn't been changed
PROFIL.NO_CERTIFICATES: You do not have any certificates yet
PROFIL.CERTIFICATES_EXPLANATION_ISSUE: This certificate gives you the permission to do a Secondary Issue on a specific Asset. The issuer of an asset automatically get this certificate if the Secondary Issue option has been specified.
PROFIL.CERTIFICATES_EXPLANATION_DOMAIN: This certificate gives you ownership of a domain (i.e. if you own the Domain 'MVS', only you can create an asset whose name start with 'MVS.'). The issuer of an asset automatically get this certificate.
PROFIL.CERTIFICATES_EXPLANATION_NAMING: This certificate gives you permission to create an asset for a specific name (i.e. if you own the name 'MVS.ASSET', you only have permission to create the Asset called 'MVS.ASSET'). This certificate can be created by the Domain owner
TRANSFER_CERT.HEADLINE: Transfer Certificate
MESSAGES.CERT_TRANSFERED: Certificate successfully transferred! Your transaction hash is:
MESSAGES.ERROR_CERT_TRANSFERED: This certificate is unable to be transferred
ASSET.NO_ASSETS: You don't have any MST yet. You can create one by clicking on the Create MST button
ISSUE_CERT.HEADLINE: Issue Certificate
ISSUE_CERT.EXPLANATION_SECONDARY_ISSUE: The Secondary Issue certificate is automatically provided upon creating an asset if the Secondary Issue option has been specified.
ISSUE_CERT.EXPLANATION_DOMAIN: The Domain certificate is automatically provided upon creating an asset.
ISSUE_CERT.EXPLANATION_NAMING: The Naming certificate can be created here. A Naming certificate can be created by the user of a Domain certificate to give authorization to create a specific asset symbol under a Domain that the user owns. After creation, this Naming certificate can be sent to another Avatar.
ISSUE_CERT.EXPLANATION_COMMENT: *Only a Naming certificate can be issued here*
HELP.ISSUE_CERT_DOMAIN: Those are your domains. You can issue a Naming certificate only on a domain that you own
HELP.ISSUE_CERT_TYPE: Only the Naming certificate can currently be issued. Secondary Issue and Domain certificates are provided upon asset creation
HELP.ISSUE_CERT_SYMBOL: This is a new symbol under one of your domains. This certificate only gives permission to create this symbol. It has to start with a domain you own, followed by a dot
HELP.ISSUE_CERT_TODID: This is the Avatar that will receive this certificate. It can be one of your Avatars or someone else's. After being issued, this certificate can be sent freely to another Avatar
ISSUE_CERT.UNUSUAL_FORMAT: An asset symbol format is usually (domain_name).(asset_name)
MESSAGES.ERROR_CERT_ISSUE: This certificate is unable to be issued
HELP.SECONDARY_ISSUE_BUTTON_DISABLED: This Asset may not be Secondary issued, as its Maximum Supply cannot be changed
DEPOSIT.AMOUNT_NOT_ENOUGH: You do not have enough ETP. Please remember to take into account the transaction fee
HELP.CREATE_AVATAR_NAME: Your Avatar name is a unique symbol. It can contain numbers, uppercase letters, lowercase letters, dots, dashes, underscores and @. It can be used instead of your ETP address to receive ETP and other assets.
HELP.CREATE_AVATAR_LINKED_ADDRESS: The address linked to the Avatar can be changed to another address of the same account in the future.
MESSAGES.CERT_ISSUED: Certificate successfully created! Your transaction hash is:
HELP.TRANSFER_CERT_SYMBOL: This is the symbol representing the certificate that you own
HELP.TRANSFER_CERT_TYPE: This is the type of certificate that you have selected
TRANSFER_CERT.TYPE_SEND_WHICH_ONE_BOTH: Send both Secondary Issue and Domain certificates
HELP.TRANSFER_CERT_TO_AVATAR: You can transfer your certificate(s) to another one of your Avatars or to someone else's Avatar
CREATE_ASSET.ERROR_SYMBOL_ALREADY_EXIST: This MST symbol already exists on the blockchain
TRANSFER.ASSET_CORRECT_MULTI_SIGN: Asset transfer to multi-signature addresses is currently not supported
CREATE_PROFILE.EXPLANATION_1: You can create your Avatar here. It represents your Digital Identity on the Metaverse blockchain.
CREATE_PROFILE.EXPLANATION_2: Your Avatar name will be publicly written on the blockchain, and can be used to send and receive ETP and assets in place of the address linked to it.
CREATE_PROFILE.EXPLANATION_3: Since the Avatar name is public information, we strongly advise using a pseudonym and not your real name. In the future, you will be able to link your Avatar with personal information like your name, but the info will be kept off-chain to guarantee your control over your personal data.
SECONDARY_ISSUE.REQUIREMENT_TITLE: Requirements to conduct a Secondary Issue
SECONDARY_ISSUE.REQUIREMENT_OWN_CERT: You need to own the Secondary issue certificate of this asset
SECONDARY_ISSUE.REQUIREMENT_OWN_CERT_OK: You are the owner of the Secondary issue certificate of this asset
SECONDARY_ISSUE.REQUIREMENT_OWN_CERT_KO: You are not the owner of the Secondary issue certificate of this asset
SECONDARY_ISSUE.REQUIREMENT_PERCENTAGE: The selected avatar needs to own at least the Secondary issue threshold of this asset
SECONDARY_ISSUE.REQUIREMENT_PERCENTAGE_O: The selected avatar owns a sufficient percentage of this asset
SECONDARY_ISSUE.REQUIREMENT_PERCENTAGE_K: The selected avatar does not own a sufficient percentage of this asset
SECONDARY_ISSUE.REQUIREMENT_FEE: The selected avatar needs to have enough ETP to pay the transaction fee (minimum 0.0001 ETP)
SECONDARY_ISSUE.REQUIREMENT_FEE_OK: The selected avatar has enough ETP
SECONDARY_ISSUE.REQUIREMENT_FEE_KO: The selected avatar does not have enough ETP
ISSUE_CERT.NO_DOMAIN: You need to own a domain first
SECONDARY_ISSUE.EXPLANATION_TYPE_DEFAULT: The default model generates the quantity of assets specified, which are directly available. The created assets are sent to the specified Avatar
SECONDARY_ISSUE.EXPLANATION_TYPE_1: The attenuation model 1 specifies a fixed quantity of assets to be unlocked at a specified interval
SECONDARY_ISSUE.EXPLANATION_TYPE_2: The attenuation model 2 lets you customize the quantity of assets unlocked and the duration of each interval
HELP.SECONDARY_ISSUE_AVATAR: This Avatar is the one that will receive the newly created asset. It will also pay the transaction fee in ETP
HELP.SECONDARY_ISSUE_QUANTITY: This is the quantity of this asset that will be created
SECONDARY_ISSUE.RECIPIENT_NOT_ENOUGH_ETP: This avatar doesn't have enough ETP to pay the transaction fee
CREATE_PROFILE.RECIPIENT_NOT_ENOUGH_ETP: This address doesn't have enough ETP to pay the transaction fee (1 ETP)
MESSAGES.SECONDARY_ISSUE_SUCCESS: Secondary issue successful! Your transaction hash is:
SECONDARY_ISSUE.RECIPIENT_NOT_ENOUGH_ASS: This avatar does not own enough of this asset to do a Secondary issue
HELP.SECONDARY_ISSUE_UNLOCK_NUMBER: This is the total number of periods that will be used
HELP.SECONDARY_ISSUE_TOTAL_LOCKED_QUANTI: This is the total number of assets that will be locked. The 'Added quantity' minus this quantity is the number of assets directly available
HELP.SECONDARY_ISSUE_TOTAL_LOCKED_PERIOD: This is the total number of blocks until the last period terminates
SECONDARY_ISSUE.MODEL2_MAX_UNLOCK_NUMBER: The number of periods for model 2 is limited to 100. If you want to use more periods, please use the command line or use model 1
HELP.SECONDARY_ISSUE_MODEL2_QUANTITY: This is the quantity that will be unfrozen at the end of period
HELP.SECONDARY_ISSUE_MODEL2_PERIOD: This is the duration, in number of blocks, of period
MESSAGES.SECONDARY_ISSUE_MODEL1_LOCKED_H: The 'Added quantity' has to be highter than the 'Total locked quantity'
MESSAGES.SECONDARY_ISSUE_MODEL2_LOCKED_H: The 'Added quantity' has to be highter than the sum of all the locked quantity
HELP.SECONDARY_ISSUE_DIRECTLY_AVAILABLE_: This is the quantity that will directly be available. It is equal to 'Added quantity' minus 'Total locked quantity'
HELP.ASSET_RECIPIENT_ADDRESS_AVATAR_BURN: The recipient can be an Address or an Avatar. To burn an asset, you can use the keyword 'blackhole'
TRANSFER_CERT.NO_CERT: You do not have any certificates yet
ISSUE_CERT.NO_DOMAIN: You need to own a Domain certificate to issue a Naming certificate
HELP.ADDRESS_INDEX: This is the index of your address. If you export your account to the lightwallet, please note that the lightwallet only loads the first 50 addresses
SETTINGS.QRCODE_TITLE: Scan this QR Code from the MyETPWallet app!
SETTINGS.EXPORT_EXPLANATION_TITLE: Two ways to export your account
SETTINGS.EXPORT_TO_FILE_EXPLANATION: Your can export your account to a json file. This file can be used to import your account to another full node wallet or to the lightwallet on your computer (myetpwallet.com)
SETTINGS.EXPORT_TO_APP_EXPLANATION: You can export your account via QRCode to the lightwallet mobile application 'MyETPWallet'. In the application login page, select the option 'Open wallet from QR Code'
SETTINGS.EXPORT_EXPLANATION_WARNING: Please note that, by default, the lightwallet only loads your first 50 addresses
SETTINGS.QRCODE_TOO_MANY_ADDRESSES1: Please note that the lightwallet only loads the first 50 addresses, while your wallet currently contains
SETTINGS.QRCODE_TOO_MANY_ADDRESSES2: addresses. If you cannot see your full balance in the lightwallet, please go to the 'Addresses' page of this wallet and move your ETP and assets to addresses with indexes lower than 50.
ASSET.DEPOSIT: I want to deposit this asset
HELP.ASSET_DEPOSIT: You can deposit assets, and they will be frozen for the number of blocks denoted. Please be aware that unlike ETP, depositing assets does not provide any reward!
ASSET_TRANSFERT.EXPLANATION_SIMPLE_DEPOS: This model will simply deposit the full quantity of assets for the number of blocks specified
HELP.ASSET_LOCKED_PERIOD: The asset will be locked for this number of blocks
SECONDARY_ISSUE.EXPLANATION_TYPE_3: The attenuation model 3 lets you unlock the asset following a specified rate
HELP.SECONDARY_ISSUE_INTEREST_RATE: This is the interest rate that will be used by the model
MESSAGES.QUANTITY_DEPOSIT_LOWER_QUANTITY: The Total locked quantity has to be less than or equal to the sent quantity
ASSET.NO_MITS: You don't have an MIT yet. You can create one by clicking on the Create MIT button
CREATE_MIT.SYMBOL_ALREADY_EXIST: This MIT symbol already exists on the blockchain
HELP.CONTENT: You can use this field to link any content to your MIT. You can enter up to 256 characters in this field
MESSAGES.MIT_CREATED: New MIT created successfully! Your transaction hash is:
ASSET_CREATE.NO_MIT: You don't have any MIT yet
CREATE_MIT.EXPLANATION_1: Metaverse Identifiable Token (MIT) is a set of token standards that allow everyone to register assets from off-chain. MIT is different from MST. It is a light token for tracking/verification of real-world assets.
CREATE_MIT.EXPLANATION_2: As a subset of MST, each MIT is identifiable, which makes it easy to track and identity.
CREATE_PROFILE_VALIDATION.TEXT2: After validation, please wait next block to see your Avatar in your account
HELP.BOUNTY_FEE: You can choose how your fee will be distributed, between the Miners and the Developer Community. This does not impact the fee that you pay for the transaction. The minimum share for Miners is 20%.
HELP.LINK_ETP_ADDRESS: This Metaverse Avatar or address will be linked to your Ethereum address and will receive the ERC20 sent from your Metaverse address to the ETPMap contract address on Ethereum
LINK_ETH.EXPLANATION_TITLE: Why and How to link your Ethereum and Metaverse addresses
LINK_ETH.WHY_EXPLANATION: Link your Ethereum and Metaverse addresses give you the ability the swap supported ERC20 tokens to their equivalent MST.
LINK_ETH.HOW_IT_WORKS_EXPLANATION: The first step is to link your Ethereum and Metaverse addresses. This form helps you to generate the Ethereum raw transaction, that you will have to broadcast via your Ethereum wallet (i.e. myetherwallet or imToken)
LINK_ETH.HOW_TO_LINK_EXPLANATION: In order to link your addresses, please fill this form and broadcast an Ethereum transaction containing the data generated.
LINK_ETH.RESULT_DATA: Data to add to an Ethereum transaction
ASSET.SWAPTOKEN: I want to swap this MST to its ERC20 equivalent
HELP.SEND_SWAPTOKEN: By choosing this option, your MST will be sent to the avatar 'crosschain' and swapped to its ERC20 equivalent on Ethereum blockchain.
HELP.MVS_TRANSACTION_FEE: This is the transaction fee for the transaction on the Metaverse blockchain
HELP.ETH_TRANSACTION_FEE: This is the transaction fee for the transaction on the Ethereum blockchain. This fee is payed in ETP, and will be automatically converted to ETH to pay for the transaction
MESSAGES.TOO_LOW_SWAPTOKEN_FEE: The swaptoken fee must be at least 1 ETP.
HELP.ETH_ADDRESS: Your token will be converted and sent to this Ethereum address
HELP.SWAPTOKEN_RECIPIENT: The recipient of a token swap has to be the avatar 'crosschain'
LINK_ETH.GO_ETH_WALLET_EXPLANATION: The next step is to go to you Ethereum wallet. It can be any wallet that has the option to add 'Data' to a transaction (myetherwallet, imToken etc...).
LINK_ETH.SEND_ETH_TITLE: Send a transaction to link your Ethereum address to this Metaverse avatar or address.
LINK_ETH.SEND_ETH_EXPLANATION1: Then, send a transaction to the ETPMap contract address on Ethereum:
LINK_ETH.SEND_ETH_EXPLANATION2: It is important that you add the data generated here in the transaction, in the field 'Data' (usually in the Advanced options). The value to send is 0 Ether, but you will have to pay the transaction fee in order to have your transaction processed.
LINK_ETH.LINKED_TITLE: Your Ethereum and Metaverse addresses are now linked!
LINK_ETH.LINKED_EXPLANATION:
The Ethereum address used to send the transaction is now linked to your Metaverse avatar or address! You can now send any supported ERC20 token to the ETPMap contract address on Ethereum, and you will receive the equivalent MST on Metaverse.

The linked avatar or address can be updated at any time by following the same process, the latest transaction is always the one taken into account.
LINK_ETH.SEND_ERC20_TITLE: Convert compatibles ERC20 tokens to MST
LINK_ETH.SEND_ERC20_EXPLANATION: You can now convert any supported ERC20 token from Ethereum to its MST equivalent on Metaverse. To do the reverse conversion, simply send the MST to the 'crosschain' avatar from this wallet, and spicify your Ethereum address to receive the ERC20 equivalent.
LINK_ETH.BOTTOM_EXPLANATION: *Please note this process link your addresses only on the Ethereum->Metaverse direction. To convert a token from Metaverse to Ethereum, simply send the MST to the avatar 'crosschain' from this wallet and specify your Ethereum address in the transaction.
